metadata.title: CVE-2015-1431 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in includes/startup.php in phpBBbefore 3.0.13 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via vectors related to "Relative Path Overwrite."

criterions.comment: phpbb3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
